original: Adamson, Nils Gerhard Rudolf, tandläkare, Skövde, f. 27/3/03 i Sjo-gerstad, Skarab. 1., av org. o. folk-skollär. Gottfrid A. o. Gerda Johansson. G. 29 m. Maria Aurell. Stud:-ex. i Skövde 22, tandl :kand. 25, tandläkare 27. Assist, i Gbg 28-29, praktik i Skövde sed, 29.
translated: Adamson, Nils Gerhard Rudolf, dentist, Skövde, b. 27/3/03 in Sjo-gerstad, Skarab. 1st child of the org. and elementary school teacher Gottfrid A. and Gerda Johansson. Married in 1929 to Maria Aurell. Completed his studies at Skövde in 1922, graduated as a dental candidate in 1925, and became a licensed dentist in 1927. Worked as an assistant in Gothenburg from 1928-1929, and has been practicing dentistry in Skövde since 1929.
